name: SuperShootShoot
description:
My 5th game for #1GAM. It's inspired by Super Crate Box, but it has a twist to it: you can upgrade your gun. You have to collect stars to upgrade it. When an enemy hit you, you lose 5 stars and when an enemy fall in the hole, you lose 10 stars. You die when you have less than 0 stars.

Twitter: https://twitter.com/_smallphil (come say hi !)

The sounds were made with http://www.bfxr.net/, except for the jetpack one (I did it with my mouth :D).

Music loop: http://www.musicradar.com/news/tech/free-music-sam...

You can play with an Xbox 360 controller !

Controls

Move

A and D

Arrow keys

LS (Xbox 360 controller)

Jump

Space

W

Up arrow key

Z

A button (Xbox 360 controller)

Shoot

Return

X

X button (Xbox 360 controller)

RB (Xbox 360 controller)

Dash

Q and D

LT and RT (Xbox controller)

Pause/Quit

Escape

Start (Xbox 360 controller)

Upgrade

Tab

Select (Xbox 360 controller)

SmallPhil
